news.title: FTC Said to Be Investigating YouTube Over Child Privacy Claims
news.description: The Federal Trade Commission is reportedly investigating YouTubeâ€™s handling of videos aimed at children.

news.title: The US Has Its Eye on Big Tech. Will Criminal Inquiries Result?
news.description: To date, large tech companies like Amazon, Apple, Facebook, and Google have been subjects of civil investigations by the U.S. government, but criminal investigations may be on the table as well.

news.title: Feds Lose Control of Thousands of Traveler Photos in Data Breach
news.description: Hackers reportedly stole thousands of traveler photos collected by a U.S. Customs and Border Protection subcontractor at a Canadian border crossing.

news.title: New SEC Lawsuit Could Decide the Fate of Dozens of Blockchain Projects
news.description: The Securities and Exchange Commission has filed a lawsuit against social media company Kik over its creation and sale of a cryptocurrency called Kin back in 2017, alleging that Kik should have filed disclosure forms required for conventional stock sales.
